issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.customfield_12310192: Remove debug parameter in HADOOP_OPTS environment when start a new job local.

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

fields.description: When hive start a new job in child VM,the debug parameter will be defined twice.
fields.summary: Remove debug parameter in HADOOP_OPTS environment when start a new job local.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12853094 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Hello, I am deferring this to Hive 3.0 as we are going to cut the first RC and it is not marked as blocker. Please feel free to commit to the branch if this can be resolved before the release.
Deferring this to 3.1.0 since the branch for 3.0.0 has been cut off. Please update the JIRA if you would like to get your patch in 3.0.0.
